story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You’re participating in the Arceus Cup,
I hear. How do you feel?
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: My Pokémon and I are ready!
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: We could battle now, if we had to!
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I also hear you’re battling to protect other
sync pairs from being attacked by
Team Rocket?
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: Who told you? Elaine and Chase?
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: I just want to battle Giovanni, personally.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You’ve gotten stronger, Blue! I can tell,
because of all the people and Pokémon who
respect you.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I’m not the same guy I was when I lost to
Red at the Indigo Pokémon League.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’m who I am today because I lost to him
back then.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
And it’s not just Red. All the people and
Pokémon I’ve met have made me stronger.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
My Pokémon believed in me every step of
the way.
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I’ve gotta step it up and get stronger so I
don’t embarrass them!
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’ll be cheering you on tomorrow!
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Thanks, Gramps! You’ve got nothing to
worry about!
story_arceus_07_07000/2401_1001_1900_10:
We’re gonna take that jerk Giovanni and
blast him away!
